_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities that make a lay follower: Practice noisy, superstitious rites, believing in omens rather than deeds
Seek outside of the Buddhist community for those worthy of religious donations
Don't practice noisy, superstitious rites, and believe in deeds rather than omens
Don't seek outside of the Buddhist community for those worthy of religious donations
